long_description: With new trails and updated maps, this indispensable guidebook will show the coolest places for winter's hottest sport! Author: Claire Walter. Softcover; 349 pages; black-and-white photographs; maps. Fulcrum Publishing; copyright 2004. For beginners seeking a new, easy-to-learn mode of exploring the outdoors to hiking enthusiasts looking for a fun and challenging winter activity.
short_description: With new trails and updated maps, this indispensable guidebook will show the coolest places for winter's hottest sport!
